name: The Isle of Bouncy Bill
description:
You fell into a slumber and woke up on the Isle of Bouncy Bill, as nice as it is, you need to get out of here.  

ADWS to move, space to jump. R to restart at any time.

Tiny game made in a day for the Weekly Game Jam on the theme 'Magic Mask'. (May be prone to bugs).

Island and all but the following assets made with Blender during the jam.

PC build recommended. WebGL serviceable but may experience some mouse bugs.

Credits:

Japanese Mask by Hideout Studio (Unity Asset Store)

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/free-japanese-mask-66432

Font (Albert Text) by Dieter Steffmann from https://www.1001freefonts.com/medieval-fonts.php

Sounds from freesound.org: 

Music by ShadyDave (Small Adventurers (music loop))

https://freesound.org/people/ShadyDave/sounds/471510/

Woodchopping sound by dheming  Wood » Wood_Chop_03.wav
